name: My Perfect Image (Demo)
description:
My Perfect Image is a game built using the Gamemaker engine. Playing as The Conductor, a detective for a supernatural peacekeeping organization known as the Sentinels, the player is tasked with investigating the rogue fleshcrafter Pygmalion as well as deciding what his last great work’s fate will ultimately be.

The controls are as such: Left click to move and interact with objects, Shift to advance/close text, enter to submit text in a textbox, and use the number keys to make choices when prompted by the textbox.

This game is currently incomplete, and only one of the three planned levels have been implemented.
